c74object.name: abc.mc.freqshift~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.freqshift~ provide parallel multiple frequency shifters. Each line is a frequency shifter in Direct Form 2 provided by a quadruple biquad.
Each frequency shifter has got a shifting frequency: fr0, fr1, etc. in Hz (positive or negative) and an individual gain: gain0, gain1, gain2, etc. in dB (between -127 and +18)

objarg.name: instances
objarg.description: sets the number of frequency shifters [init=1:min=1:max=16]

attribute.name: fr[index]
attribute.description: sets the shifting frequency of the [index] frequency shifter in Hz, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-10000:max=10000:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the shifting frequency of the [index] frequency shifter in Hz

attribute.name: gain[index]
attribute.description: sets the gain of the [index] frequency shifter in dB, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the gain of the [index] frequency shifter in dB

method.name: fr[index]
method.description: sets the shifting frequency of the [index] frequency shifter in Hz, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-10000:max=10000:step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the shifting frequency of the [index] frequency shifter in Hz

method.name: gain[index]
method.description: sets the gain of the [index] frequency shifter in dB, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the gain of the [index] frequency shifter in dB
